In England, in the seven days to 24 August, there were 184,496 new confirmed cases (326.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 17 August, there were 181,601 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 2% (2,895 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 29 August is 5,838,323 (10,324.2 cases per 100,000 population).
